PageTitle: display bgp vpnv4 multicast all routing-table statistics
FuncDef: The display bgp vpnv4 multicast all routing-table statistics command displays statistics about BGP VPNv4 routes in the VPNv4-Multicast address family.
CLIs: display bgp vpnv4 multicast all routing-table [ peer <ipv4-address> { advertised-routes | received-routes } ] statistics

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies an IPv4 address.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Routes advertised to the remote peer.
-

Routes received from the remote peer.
-

Examples: <HUAWEI> display bgp vpnv4 multicast all routing-table statistics
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The display bgp vpnv4 multicast all routing-table statistics command displays statistics about BGP VPNv4 routes in the VPNv4-Multicast address family.
